description:
LegacyBaseWallet.invoke(address,uint256,bytes) (legacy/LegacyBaseWallet.sol#127-132) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- (success) = _target.call.value(_value)(_data) (legacy/LegacyBaseWallet.sol#129)
markdown:
[LegacyBaseWallet.invoke(address,uint256,bytes)](contracts/legacy/LegacyBaseWallet.sol#L127-L132) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- [(success) = _target.call.value(_value)(_data)](contracts/legacy/LegacyBaseWallet.sol#L129)

description:
BaseWallet.invoke(address,uint256,bytes) (wallet/BaseWallet.sol#120-132) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- (success,_result) = _target.call.value(_value)(_data) (wallet/BaseWallet.sol#123)

[BaseWallet.invoke(address,uint256,bytes)](contracts/wallet/BaseWallet.sol#L120-L132) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- [(success,_result) = _target.call.value(_value)(_data)](contracts/wallet/BaseWallet.sol#L123)

description:
MakerV2Loan.debt(uint256) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#442-458) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-_fullRepayment = art.mul(rate).div(RAY).add(1).add(art - art.mul(rate).div(RAY).mul(RAY).div(rate)) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#454-456)
markdown:
[MakerV2Loan.debt(uint256)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L442-L458) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[_fullRepayment = art.mul(rate).div(RAY).add(1).add(art - art.mul(rate).div(RAY).mul(RAY).div(rate))](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L454-L456)

description:
CompoundManager.closeLoan(BaseWallet,bytes32) (modules/CompoundManager.sol#114-135) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- collateral == 0 (modules/CompoundManager.sol#129)

CompoundManager.exitMarketIfNeeded(BaseWallet,address,address) (modules/CompoundManager.sol#421-427) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- collateral == 0 && debt == 0 (modules/CompoundManager.sol#424)
markdown:
[CompoundManager.exitMarketIfNeeded(BaseWallet,address,address)](contracts/modules/CompoundManager.sol#L421-L427) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [collateral == 0 && debt == 0](contracts/modules/CompoundManager.sol#L424)

elements.name: require(bool,string)(recoveryConfigs[address(_wallet)].executeAfter == 0,RM: there cannot be an ongoing recovery)

description:
RecoveryManager.notWhenRecovery(BaseWallet) (modules/RecoveryManager.sol#78-81) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(recoveryConfigs[address(_wallet)].executeAfter == 0,RM: there cannot be an ongoing recovery) (modules/RecoveryManager.sol#79)
markdown:
[RecoveryManager.notWhenRecovery(BaseWallet)](contracts/modules/RecoveryManager.sol#L78-L81) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [require(bool,string)(recoveryConfigs[address(_wallet)].executeAfter == 0,RM: there cannot be an ongoing recovery)](contracts/modules/RecoveryManager.sol#L79)

description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract Proxy (wallet/Proxy.sol#24-51) has payable functions:
	 - Proxy.fallback() (wallet/Proxy.sol#34-50)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [Proxy](contracts/wallet/Proxy.sol#L24-L51) has payable functions:
	 - [Proxy.fallback()](contracts/wallet/Proxy.sol#L34-L50)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

description:
Reentrancy in MakerV2Loan.openVault(BaseWallet,address,uint256,uint256) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#491-519):
	External calls:
	- _cdpId = cdpManager.open(ilk,address(this)) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#509)
	- joinCollateral(_wallet,_cdpId,_collateralAmount,ilk) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#512)
	- drawAndExitDebt(_wallet,_cdpId,_debtAmount,_collateralAmount,ilk) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#515)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- MakerV2Loan.loanIds (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#53) in saveLoanOwner(_wallet,bytes32(_cdpId)) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#518)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [MakerV2Loan.openVault(BaseWallet,address,uint256,uint256)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L491-L519):
	External calls:
	- [_cdpId = cdpManager.open(ilk,address(this))](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L509)
	- [joinCollateral(_wallet,_cdpId,_collateralAmount,ilk)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L512)
	- [drawAndExitDebt(_wallet,_cdpId,_debtAmount,_collateralAmount,ilk)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L515)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [MakerV2Loan.loanIds](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L53) in [saveLoanOwner(_wallet,bytes32(_cdpId))](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L518)

description: MakerV2Loan.joinCollateral(BaseWallet,uint256,uint256,bytes32) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#370-395) ignores return value by collateral.approve(address(gemJoin),_collateralAmount) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#392)
MakerV2Loan.joinDebt(BaseWallet,uint256,uint256) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#397-411) ignores return value by daiToken.approve(address(daiJoin),_debtAmount) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#407)

WalletFactory._registerWalletENS(address,string) (infrastructure/WalletFactory.sol#382-390) ignores return value by BaseWallet(_wallet).invoke(ensReverseRegistrar,0,methodData) (infrastructure/WalletFactory.sol#387)
BaseWallet.implementation (wallet/BaseWallet.sol#27) should be constant
LegacyBaseWallet.implementation (legacy/LegacyBaseWallet.sol#36) should be constant
